name: Steamer Rotisserie Chicken ‘n Veggie Soup
description: Soup is a souper way to use up leftover cooked chicken. This is a versatile recipe—use your favourite frozen veggies or swap in fresh seasonal favourites.

ingredients.name: water or your choice of broth

preparation: In Round Steamer, combine diced tomatoes, seasoning, and water. Cover; microwave on high until hot, 6–8 min. Stir halfway through cooking.
Stir in veggies and chicken. Cover; microwave on high until veggies are tender, about 3 min.
Ladle into bowls; add toppings, if desired.
tips: Add a splash of cream for a full-bodied soup.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kin —free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
